Yii Framework v2.0.0-dev Class Reference

Class yii\log\EmailTarget

All Classes | Properties | Methods
Inheritanceyii\log\EmailTarget » yii\log\Target » yii\base\Component » yii\base\Object
Implementsyii\base\Arrayable
Available since version2.0
Source Code
EmailTarget sends selected log messages to the specified email addresses.

You may configure the email to be sent by setting the $message property, through which you can set the target email addresses, subject, etc.

Hide inherited properties

PropertyTypeDescriptionDefined By
$enabled boolean Whether to enable this log target yii\log\Target
$categories array List of message categories that this target is interested in yii\log\Target
$except array List of message categories that this target is NOT interested in yii\log\Target
$logUser boolean Whether to log a message containing the current user name and ID yii\log\Target
$logVars array List of the PHP predefined variables that should be logged in a message yii\log\Target
$exportInterval integer How many messages should be accumulated before they are exported yii\log\Target
$messages array The messages that are retrieved from the logger so far by this log target yii\log\Target
$message array The configuration array for creating a yii\mail\MessageInterface object yii\log\EmailTarget
$mail yii\mail\MailerInterface|string The mailer object or the application component ID of the mailer object yii\log\EmailTarget
$behaviors yii\base\Behavior[] list of behaviors attached to this component yii\log\EmailTarget
$levels integer the message levels that this target is interested in yii\log\EmailTarget

MethodDescriptionDefined By
getContextMessage() Generates the context information to be logged. yii\log\Target

Property Details

$message property
array $message = []

The configuration array for creating a yii\mail\MessageInterface object. Note that the "to" option must be set, which specifies the destination email address(es).

$mail property
yii\mail\MailerInterface|string $mail = 'mail'

The mailer object or the application component ID of the mailer object. After the EmailTarget object is created, if you want to change this property, you should only assign it with a mailer object.

$behaviors property read-only
yii\base\Behavior[] getBehaviors( )

list of behaviors attached to this component

$levels property
integer getLevels( )
void setLevels( $levels )

the message levels that this target is interested in. This is a bitmap of level values. Defaults to 0, meaning all available levels.
